Title: In the Beginning
Writer: Xavier Giannoli (screenplay), Daniel Karlin (collaborating writer), Marcia Romano (collaborating writer)
Actors: François Cluzet, Emmanuelle Devos, Gérard Depardieu, Soko
Plot: France, present day. A professional conman passes himself off as the boss of a construction site building a highway extension. He cons the whole region, hires dozens of workers and cynically enjoys the profits of his scam until he meets the lady mayor of a small village that the road will go through. She intrigues and unsettles him, before revealing to him a world he never knew: feelings. How far will he go now to save his victims and save himself from his own lies?
